rows.label: tev066601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_SEL0011
rows.name:
Ask Zo Langra how things have been
since putting the Ganglion behind him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Zo Langra about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Zo Langra what he will do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Zo Langra about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0001
rows.name:
The Ganglion sent many assassins while we were
hiding in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0002
rows.name:
Though weakened by hunger, we still managed to drive
our would-be killers away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0003
rows.name: But Oblivia is a harsh land, and it took its toll.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0004
rows.name:
Our wounded grew in number, and my brothers
who set out to save them met with fierce battle.
...They were slaughtered to a man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0005
rows.name:
You may hate the Ganglion, but we have our reasons
to fight them as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0010
rows.name: Thank you for saving my elder sister, Zazhi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0011
rows.name:
She still threatens to run off and do the fiend in,
but from now on I will stop her, even if it kills me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0012
rows.name:
I lack your strength, and have no hope of defeating
our nemesis...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0013
rows.name:
But as head of the House of Zo, I have a responsibility
to keep my sister out of harm's way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0018
rows.name:
The dwellers of this strange "skyscraper" offered me
work as a guard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0019
rows.name:
Now that the battle with the Ganglion is done and
the Wrothians have no more work as mercenaries...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0020
rows.name:
a guard seemed as good a way to make a living
as any.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0021
rows.name:
Of course, my sister would hear none of it.
She said that no warrior would dare demean
themselves with such base work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG0022
rows.name:
But how else am I to put my strength to use?
This shall require some thought...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG1001
rows.name:
Not only did you save my sister's life, but you even
managed to put an end to that fiend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG1002
rows.name:
Thank you. The House of Zo will remember our debt to
you so long as time marches forward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG1003
rows.name: I hope Zazhi can put thoughts of vengeance behind her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG1004
rows.name:
She is the House of Zo's beloved maiden,
and must be wed to a strong warrior![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066601_MSG1005
rows.name:
As head of our house, I see this as my new duty.
I also see it as a losing battle...but try I will![ST:wait ]
